column3: of merrimack passed away on wednesday june 10
column4: 2015 at her home. she was born in concord
column7: daughter of the late joseph and mary (warsewicz) falco. jo is survived by several close friends
column8: and all that knew her. a private graveside service will be held at last rest cemetery in merrimack at a later date. to sign an online guestbook
